qas.question: How much was the signing payment for Diego Maradona?
When was Diego Maradona signed by Barcelona?
Who did Barcelona defeat the season following the signing of Maradona?
Who was hired as manager in 1984?
What caused the loss to Steaua Bucuresti in Seville?

context: In <a1_0>June 1982<a1_0/>, Diego Maradona was signed for a world record fee of <a0_0>£5 million<a0_0/> from Boca Juniors. In the following season, under coach Luis, Barcelona won the Copa del Rey, beating <a2_0>Real Madrid<a2_0/>. However, Maradona's time with Barcelona was short-lived and he soon left for Napoli. At the start of the 1984–85 season, <a3_0>Terry Venables<a3_0/> was hired as manager and he won La Liga with noteworthy displays by German midfielder Bernd Schuster. The next season, he took the team to their second European Cup final, only to lose on <a4_0>penalties<a4_0/> to Steaua Bucureşti during a dramatic evening in Seville.
